entries.message: Thank you for your patience all functions are returned at this time

Updated*** Event Type: Network Upgrade

We are performing Bare metal system changes in the Atlanta location during the following scheduled maintenance window. 

Start Time: 2022-07-25 18:00:00 UTC
End Time: 2022-07-25 22:00:00 UTC


Servers will remain powered on and there will be no interruption to Public or VPC network connectivity, however system controls will be affected.  During this Maintenance Window you will be unable to issue Power On/Off/Cycle commands, access the VNC Console, deploy new servers, or reinstall existing subscriptions.
Thank you for your patience all functions are returned at this time

Event Type: Network Upgrade

We are performing Baremetal system changes in the Tokyo location during the following scheduled maintenance window. 

Start Time: 2022-07-25 16:00:00 UTC
End Time: 2022-07-25 20:00:00 UTC


Baremetal servers will remain powered on and there will be no interruption to Public or VPC network connectivity, however system controls will be affected.  During this Maintenance Window you will be unable to issue Power On/Off/Cycle commands, access the VNC Console, deploy new servers, or reinstall existing subscriptions.

We schedule higher impact maintenance events during off-peak times to maintain our ideal hosting environment. Our engineers make every effort to minimize system impact; however, Tokyo instances may be unreachable for some, or all, of the scheduled maintenance window as we perform network, firmware, or host upgrades.
